text: Helloes! :wave: I'm a digital marketer with a web developer / designer background. I'm here to learn more about the CMS and get fluent with HUBL.  All advice is much appreciated and I will try and help where I can as well ofc :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi all! I'm a web developer/content creator (nee writer) who is focusing on HubSpot in 2019. Why? Because like bank robber Willie Sutton sort of said, *"That's where the money is."* ( <https://quoteinvestigator.com/2013/02/10/where-money-is/>) Hopefully, that's where the clients be - companies that need a content strategy implemented, companies that need HubSpot better implemented and companies who need help with the Design Manager and HubSpot's very different way of doing html pages.

Hello
<@UH8USUDNF> here!
I want to help everyone's HubSpot project!

Welcome, <@UH8USUDNF> you’ve got quite a name to live up to! One ask, please don’t post something in every channel.  Find the one that most fits your needs and post there (like this channel is perfect for introducing yourself).  It can get quite distracting for someone to post a message in every channel they can find. Appreciate the enthusiasm though
I am new to this community, so I wanted to let everyone know I have jumped in this community
Posting something in every channel is also quite difficult for me
Btw, can I get the link to jobs channel?
i want some of whatever you are drinking :slightly_smiling_face:
I was just thinking to myself I looked away from slack for only like 5 minutes then all of a sudden all the channels are lit up
